subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Not to be a wet blanket
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_5dc54336-39bb-4bb0-8b08-352a8c90913a_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Sharon,
 
I thank you for listening to my files and your generous comments=
.
 
As for faith, If you can not put some faith in the messenger then the m=
essage is more in question.
that is only my opinion, but I have been doing =
this for quite a while.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
omFrom: leongbabe@...: Fri, 4 Jan 2008 04:45:07 +0000Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: Not to be a wet blanket




Hi Bruce,I've really tried to listen t=
o as many files as I have time for, and for the most part, am quite impress=
ed with what people have captured from the boxes. To echo your closing sent=
iment on flying a little on faith that the voices coming through are who th=
ey claim to be, I'd like to add that one can never be 100% sure and so I si=
mply accept them at face value, giving more weight to to the message than t=
he messenger.Sharon--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranorm=
alinvestigating@...> wrote:>> Ann,> > Thanks for listening that batch of fi=
les came from a recent session when the signal was not at it's optimum.> So=
me times you will receive a less than adequate session due to the condition=
s at the time the session is in progress> I and a couple of other researche=
rs are now in the process of documenting the exact conditions present durin=
g> a box session and the different affects some conditions have on the clar=
ity and strength of the communication.> > As far as the Elvis message goes,=
 we have to remember that spirits where also people at one time and that wh=
en > we go to the first spiritual level after we leave the physical we carr=
y with us many of the characteristics we had in our earthly personality.> s=
ome spirits are shy some out going some serious some are comedians.> > I be=
lieve the Elvis impersonation was not meant maliciously but as a joke. Also=
 the way I determine the validity of the communications I receive is> I hav=
e gotten to know my techs and have built a relationship with them, I recogn=
ise the way they speak and they will even go out of their way> to manipulat=
e certain sound fragments so that the voice they create is familiar and rec=
ognisable to me. I can pretty much rely on what I get from them.> But you c=
an never be 100% sure, you can only use your best judgement and gut instinc=
t and fly a little on faith.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@...=
: lisby@...: Thu, 3 Jan 2008 13:34:27 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Not to be=
 a wet blanket> > > > > Bruce--I listened to them all, every single one tha=
t got posted yesterday.> > I didn't comment because I didn't find this batc=
h to be as strong as yours usually are. Although I meant to post and say th=
at I was quite sad that the Elvis we heard might be an impersonator. Would =
you ask them why they allow a fake to come through--since that EVP was quit=
e long and elaborately "staged," for lack of a better term. Surely Mike cou=
ld stop a fake? I'm very curious about what's happening over there as we ar=
e operating the box, and it is very important to me to feel a good amount o=
f certainty that the people coming through are who they claim to be. If you=
 can ask, I'd be grateful. I don't seem to be able to get those kind of res=
ponses yet on my own.> > > Ann> > > On Jan 3, 2008, at 10:14 AM, bhali333 w=
rote:> > > > > But ,yesterday I posted like 20 files and did not recieve on=
e reply on any of them.Yet a post about a broken cell phone recieves a hund=
red replies.What is this group about?Frank is right what the hell is the se=
nse of posting files to an EVP-ITCgroup if no one pays attention to the evp=
's or files that are posted.I admit I do not reply to every single post mys=
elf but I do try and reply to most.If no one is even bothering to listen to=
 the files you are really missing what this is all about.Come o9n guy's thi=
s is supposed to be about the exchange of ideas and constructive suggestion=
s on evp-itc research. It's not a chat board or a forum for personal vendet=
a'sLet's get with the program and do some evp work.And I'll bet I get some =
replies to this post that's for sure !Bruce> > > > > > > > ________________=
__________________________________________> i'm is proud to present Cause E=
ffect, a series about real people making a difference.> http://im.live.com/=
Messenger/IM/MTV/?source=3Dtext_Cause_Effect> 






______________________=
___________________________________________

ant with Windows Vista=AE + Windows Live=99.
